name: Language Archaeology (Finnish)
description:
An idea I got while I played Tomb Raider and was worried if I could complete my Finnish courses. So a bit of puzzle with some language lessons.

Remember that Finnish 'U' is pronounced like 'O'

Notice:

- This is only a prototype

- Spelling and parsing might be incorrect 

-Made during Qazi Jam 10

-You need to do ALT-F4 to exit
